content.rendered:
• Upward review of allowance for Casual staff
  • Appointment of 2 School Directors
  • Inclusion of 2 School Directors into College Management Committee
  • Appointment and Inauguration of College Academic Board Committee
  • Appointment of Director Academic Planning, Ag. Director Works and Academic Secretary
  • Securing of NBTE accreditation for ND Nursing programme
  • Inclusion of the College in JAMB Brochure for ND Nursing programme
  • Securing of approval for Two (2) Streams for Nursing and Midwifery programmes by Nursing and Midwifery Council of Nigeria (NMCN)
  • Introduction of Community Nursing programme
  • Retreat for all College Management, Governing Council, Schools Directors and Ministry of Health Officials
  • Tripartite Meeting of Governing Council, College Management and the Schools
  • Securing of approval from Governing Council for the appointment of Deputy Provost
  • Securing of approval from Governing Council for the establishment of Consultancy Service and Public Relation Unit
  • Securing of approval from Governing Council for the establishment of Public Relations Unit
  • Securing of approval from Governing Council for the conduct of Mock Accreditation
  • Securing of approval from Governing Council for the conduct of workshop on measurement and evaluation, research and data analysis using excel and SPSS
  • Securing of approval from Governing Council for the conduct of matriculation for newly admitted students.
  • Securing of approval from Governing Council for the College Adopted Scheme of Service
  • Deployment of online registration portal for printing of admission letter, online registration, payment of all registration fee, course registration, hostel allocation and e-exam card.
  • Production of College Gown
  • Development of College Year Planner, Scatter-gram, Academic Calendar and organogram.
  • Formulation of College’s Vision and Mission
  • Securing of approval from Governing Council for the purchase of printers, scanners and photocopiers for the Schools.
  • Securing of approval from Governing Council for the educational partnership with Ladoke Akintola University, Ogbomosho, Oyo State for BNSc Nursing Science and postgraduate programmes.
  • Provision of 42 No. new Fire Extinguishers and refilling of 40 existing ones in SON st. Paul and SOM Malumfashi.
